title: Stalking Her
description: Nicholaa Ashwen Supermodel... That was all Xavier Grasso thought about. He watched her day in and day out. Biding his time until he made his move to take her away from the world. He wanted a world where he did not need to share her. No matter the consequences, Xavier would kill to make her his, or die trying.  Warning: This book contains material of a violent sexual nature, sex and submission, abuse and violence. If this material offends please refrain from reading. It is recommended for readers aged 18yrs and over.
author: E.L. Beth
